name: White Tiles 4 Pro: Piano Master (All games in 1)
name_original: White Tiles 4 Pro: Piano Master (All games in 1)
description:
◈◈ "White Tiles 4" has upgraded to "White Tiles 4 Pro"◈
◈ ◈ "White Tiles 4 Pro" now has 300 AWESOME Games. ◈ ◈

Dear White Tiles 4 player,

◈ This is WANG BOXUN from Brighthouse studio, White Tiles 4 has upgraded to White Tiles 4 Pro, which has more games, more songs, more themes, and more fun.

◈ White Tiles 4 has 100 whiteTiles games and more than 200 trivia games.

◈ The only thing you need to do is just TAP. Tap to start, tap to have fun.

◈ We will keep improving our game,more features are coming soon!

【Game Features】:
◈ 300 Awesome Games in 1 App.
◈ User Interface & Game Graphics Redesigned.
◈ New Game Categories system (Now you can find your favorite games more easily).
◈ Customize Your Own Games.
◈ Music system
◈ Theme system
◈ Random system
◈ More Instruments : Piano, Guitar, Drum, Dubstep
◈ Amazing Color system
◈ Easy to play for all ages.
◈ An unparalleled gaming experience
◈ Social Share Support

Your always friends,
Wang Boxun
